item.title: CVE-2017-7502|2024-08-05T16:04:11.874Z -- nss%20project -- nss
item.description: Null pointer dereference vulnerability in NSS since 3.24.0 was found when server receives empty SSLv2 messages resulting into denial of service by remote attacker.
